item.title: Help with adding shops
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

i removed everything under it, and added to where you told me.

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop private int WanneBank = 0; private int WanneShop = 0; //check shopping if (WanneShop > 0) { if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { openUpShop(WanneShop); WanneShop = 0; } } public int clickingWarning;

Read full topic
